name: LogiFlow
desc: Engineered logistics analytics pipeline on GCP with Python, Dataflow, Cloud Scheduler, and BigQuery, increasing throughput by 40%. Also used Mage.ai and Cloud Scheduler

name: Fraud Detection System

name: PodcastGPT
desc: Developed PodcastGPT with FAISS, OpenAI GPT, and LangChain, boosting query retrieval by 15%. Built a scalable API with FastAPI, Docker, AWS Lambda, and Step Functions, enhancing search efficiency.

name: ShopPulse
desc: Built real-time analytics for e-commerce trends with Python and streaming pipelines, improving customer engagement metrics.

name: Mindmate
desc: Developed a JavaScript-based mental health support app integrating AI-driven recommendations for emotional well-being.

name: SalesSight
desc: Designed a predictive sales analytics platform leveraging Python for forecasting trends and customer behavior analysis.

name: Transport Network
desc: Analyzed transport networks and optimized traffic flows using Jupyter Notebook and geospatial data processing techniques.

name: Tours Management
desc: Discover and book amazing tours with ToursManagement: your go-to platform for unforgettable travel experiences and seamless bookings.

name: Brain x Tumor
desc: Streamlit app allowing you to upload an MRI image and predict if there's a brain tumor or not using a trained Keras model.

name: Disease-Prediction-Online
desc: This app will analyze your disease symptoms and predict using Machine Learning on the web.
